TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void VolumeRemovedHandler(object o, VolumeRemovedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed VolumeRemovedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the VolumeRemovedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the VolumeRemovedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the VolumeRemovedHandler is removed from the event.
